definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: It seems likely that this protein will attract a great deal more analgesic research.
sentences.chinese: 這種蛋白質可能會引發更多的鎮痛劑研究。

sentences.english: In the control group, the treatments were given upon the symptoms with calcium and analgesics.
sentences.chinese: 對照組用補鈣劑或鎮痛劑對症治療。

sentences.english: He was heavily dosed with painkillers.
The shopping mall is now the opiate of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 購物中心現在成了大衆的鎮痛劑。

sentences.english: Now I'm on the couch and popping painkillers.
sentences.chinese: 現在只能坐在長沙發上拼命擦鎮痛劑。

sentences.english: Will you give me a pain-killer ?
sentences.chinese: 你可以給我一個鎮痛劑嗎？
